altTitles.ja: 7人の眠り姫

description.en: A wandering prince set off to break an ancient curse bewitching the Kingdom of Amaryllis by waking up its princess with a kiss of true love. However, nobody told him there were 7 princesses to kiss and he must now take responsibility by living with them while they find out why the people of Amaryllis are unable to wake up. Will they reach a happily ever after?
description.fr: Un prince errant est parti pour briser une ancienne malédiction qui ensorcelle le royaume d'Amaryllis en réveillant sa princesse par un baiser d'amour véritable. Cependant, personne ne lui a dit qu'il y avait 7 princesses à embrasser et il doit maintenant prendre ses responsabilités en vivant avec elles pendant qu'ils découvrent pourquoi les habitants d'Amaryllis sont incapables de se réveiller. Parviendront-ils à être heureux pour toujours ?
description.ru:
Герой пришел спасти спящую принцессу от проклятья злой ведьмы, но когда он добрался до места... Там оказалось 7 девушек!
Принц Рудбекии - Алек и семь принцесс, в стране, где они единственные бодрствующие, начинают свою совместную жизнь, чтобы освободить всех ото сна!

altTitles.vi: Bắt nạt mình đi mà, nữ phản diện ơi!

altTitles.th: โปรดรังแกฉันทีคุณนางร้าย!

altTitles.zh-ro: Qǐng qīfù wǒ ba, è yì xiǎojiě!

altTitles.ru: Пожалуйста, поиздевайтесь надо мной, мисс Злодейка!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor, me humilhe, senhorita vilã!

altTitles.ar: !تنمرِ علي من فضلكِ يا أنسة الشر

altTitles.fr: Je vous en supplie madame l'antagoniste, Harcelez moi !

altTitles.ja: いじめてください、悪役令嬢様！

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

title.en: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Pseudo-Singularity III: The Stage of Carnage, Shimousa - Seven Duels of Swordmasters

altTitles.ja: フェイト／グランドオーダー　エピック　オブ　レムナント　亜種特異点３／亜種並行世界 屍山血河舞台 下総国 英霊剣豪七番勝負

altTitles.ja-ro: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Ashu Tokuiten 3 / Ashu Heikou Sekai: Shizan Ketsuga Butai, Shimousa no Kuni - Eirei Kengou Nanaban Shoubu

altTitles.ru: Судьба/Великий приказ -Эпопея Остатка- Турнир Семи Героев-Мастеров Меча

altTitles.vi: Dị Điểm Á Chủng III – Vũ Đài Núi Thây Sông Máu – Trận Chiến Thứ Bảy Ở Shimosha

description.en:
Fans of Fate/Grand Order—rejoice! A new side story appears...with all the twists and turns you might expect! Epic of Remnant is here!

---

Note: The chapters in this title follow magazine release numbering.
description.ru: Манга-адаптация одноименного сюжетного акта игры Fate/Grand Order. Фуджимару теряет сознание и, придя в себя, понимает, что очутилась в Японии периода Эдо. Там она встречает Миямото Мусаши, которую когда-то уже видела во сне. Исторически Мусаши был мужчиной, который прославился на весь мир как мастер меча. Почему же теперь их двое, мужчина и женщина с одним именем? Настало время начала Семи Поединков Мастеров Меча!

title.en: Tanbo de Hirotta Onna Kishi, Inaka de Ore no Yome da to Omowareteiru

altTitles.ja: 田んぼで拾った女騎士、田舎で俺の嫁だと思われている

altTitles.en: All My Neighbors are Convinced the Female Knight from My Rice Field is My Wife

altTitles.th: เพราะดันไปเก็บตกอัศวินหญิงจากท้องนา แถวบ้านเลยลือว่านางเป็นภรรยาของผม ตอนที่
เก็บอัศวินหญิงได้จากท้องนา ตอนที่

description.en:
Jin Mita, a farmer living in a small countryside town, discovers an unconscious female knight in his rice field one morning. She calls herself Seraphim, and she seems to have come from another world. She has no knowledge of this world and nowhere to go. Unable to bear seeing her like this, Jin offered to take her in, but apparently the people around him think that Seraphim is his wife...!?

(Source: Magazine Pocket)
description.ja: 小さな田舎町で農家として暮らす三田仁は、ある朝自分の田んぼに女騎士が倒れているのを発見する。セラフィムと名乗る彼女は、どうやら異世界からやって来たらしい。この世界の知識もなく行き場もない。そんな彼女を見かねて一緒に暮らすことを提案するも、どうやら周りからはセラフィムが俺の嫁だと思われてるようで…!? お日様の下の農作業と新鮮素材のお料理。そして美人女騎士と送る、のんびり田舎スローライフ開幕！
description.vi: Một ngày nọ, tôi ra thăm ruộng, thì vô tình gặp một nữ hiệp sĩ đang nằm trong bãi ruộng nhà tôi. Cô ta tự xưng là Seraphim, là kị sĩ tới từ một đế quốc viễn tưởng nào đó. Có vẻ như cô ấy nói thật, vì cô ta không có bất cứ kiến thức gì về thế giới này. Do không thể để mặc cô ấy như vậy, tôi đành đưa cô ấy về nhà chăm sóc. Và do ở vùng quê người ta biết hết dù chỉ là một sự thay đổi nhỏ nhất, người ta bắt đầu đồn cô ấy là vợ tôi...

altTitles.ja: ルリドラゴン

description.en:
Ruri, a high school student, woke up one morning to find that she had suddenly grown horns on her head!

Her mother told her that she might have inherited it because her father is a dragon. Ruri's mother tells her that she might have inherited it from her father, and she is puzzled, but goes to school anyway....

Her classmates are curious about the spontaneous horn, and another dragon constitution is revealed!

With a slight change in the usual routine, the daily life of Dragon Girl Ruri begins!
description.tr: Tembellik ve çalışkanlık arasında git gel yaşayan ejder kızın gündelik maceraları.
description.pt-br: Ruri Aoki é uma garota normal que um dia acorda com um par de chifres em sua cabeça. De acordo com sua mãe, o pai de Ruri, que ela nunca conheceu antes, é um dragão e Ruri só é metade humana. Esta é a história da jornada de autodescobrimento e aceitação de uma garota metade humana, metade dragão.

altTitles.ja: ほうかごがかり

description.en:
When the clock strikes midnight, we're trapped in "After-School." In that world, there's no right answer, no end, no "game clear." There’s only our lifeless bodies, stacking up one by one.
One day, Kei Nimori, a young elementary school student, suddenly notices his name scrawled on the classroom blackboard, alongside the mysterious words "After-School Duty."
Thus begins a dark, midnight fairy tale of several young boys and girls risking their lives to record and contain monsters in a bizarre realm known as "After-School."

altTitles.vi: Nhân vật Webtoon  Na Kang Lim

description.en: Na Kang Lim, a high school student who enjoys reading webtoons, experiences a strange event one day when the female lead from his favorite webtoon appears before him. Even more surprising, the same incidents that put her in danger in the webtoon start happening in real life. The problem is, there's no protagonist in the real world to save her! Ultimately, Na Kang Lim takes on the role of the protagonist, looping through time to save her.
description.vi: Na Kang Lim, nam sinh trung học bình trường rất thích đọc webtoon. Một ngày, đã có chuyện bất ngờ xảy ra, nữ chính từ bộ webtoon cậu hay đọc đã xuất hiện ngoài đợi thật. Những sự cố trong webtoon khiến cô ấy rơi vào khủng hoảng, nhưng nhân vật chính lại không có ở đây để giải cứu nữ chính! Và Kang Lim đã trở thành nhân vật chính cùng với kí ước từ bộ truyện và khả năng du hành thời gian để cứu nữ chính

title.en: Bokura no Ai wa Kimochi Warui

altTitles.ja: 僕らのアイは気持ち悪い

altTitles.ja-ro: Bokura no Ai wa Kimochi Warui

description.en:
Everyone is hiding a "secret."

Azuki Komugi is obsessed with ruminating on her memories of her high school girlfriend "Meguru," and creating a body model of hers out of clay.

One day, Azuki drops her homemade "Meguru" at the 100-yen shop where she works part-time, and sneaks into her workplace on her off-shift to get "her" back. However, what she sees there is a fellow co-worker, high school girl Yoyuki Remu, who is about to express her lust for "Meguru" in a way that is different from Azuki's...

altTitles.ja: 世にも過保護な魔王様

description.en:
Sena Yamada is a second-year in high school. For various reasons, she lives alone. She manages to get by by holding down a part-time job. One day, when she was about to be cheated out of her money, she was rescued by a demon king! He told her that she is a reincarnation of a saint and even asked her to move in with him...?　

The exciting life together of a hardworking JK and a pushy demon king is about to begin!

altTitles.en: The Rise of Tanaka in Another World

altTitles.ja: タナカの異世界成り上がり

description.en:
Tanaka, a 32-year-old man, gets caught up as a bystander while the hero is summoned to another world. His stats are mediocre and skills are unremarkable, but Tanaka remains positive and decides to have fun in this new world, saying, "Since I'm here, I want to use magic!" 

What will he encounter on his journey while meeting reliable companions?!

title.en: My Dearest Self With Malice Aforethought

altTitles.ru: Мое дорогое Я со злым умыслом

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinai naru Boku e Satsui o Komete

altTitles.ja: 親愛なる僕へ殺意をこめて

description.de:
Auf den ersten Blick scheint Eiji ein ganz normaler Student zu sein, doch er hat ein Geheimnis: sein verstorbener Vater war ein berüchtigter Serienmörder, der für seine extreme Grausamkeit bekannt war.
Eines Tages wacht Eiji neben einem schönen fremden Mädchen auf, das anscheinend in ihn verliebt ist und behauptet, seine Freundin zu sein, doch eigenartigerweise kann er sich nicht an sie erinnern. Die letzten Tage scheinen wie aus seinem Gedächtnis gelöscht, und es fühlt sich an, als hätte jemand anders die Kontrolle übernommen. Zur selben Zeit findet die örtliche Polizei eine aufs Übelste verstümmelte Leiche, und für sie besteht kein Zweifel: Eijis Vater ist zurück... doch kann das wirklich sein?
description.en: Urashima Eiji, a college student, goes to sleep after a fun drinking night with his friends. When he wakes up he discovers a beautiful girl next to him who treats him as if they are in a loving relationship. Later, Eiji finds out that 4 days have passed since he went out with his crew. What did he do during all that time and why does he have no memory of it? By confronting that reality, he will be caught in tragedy…
description.ne: एइजी, कलेज उमेरको कुमारले कुनै दिन प्रेमिका हुने सपना देख्छ... अनि एक दिन आफ्नो "प्रेमिका" को साथ आफ्नो ओछ्यानमा उठ्छ! त्यति मात्र होइन, उसको साथीले उसलाई बताउँछ कि ऊ झगडामा परेको छ ... र त्यो तीन दिन बितिसक्यो जुन एइजीलाई याद छैन? के अँध्यारो रहस्यहरू लुकाइरहेका छ ... एइजी आफैले?
description.ru:
Урашима Эйджи, студент колледжа, засыпает после веселой ночи с друзьями. Когда он просыпается, он обнаруживает рядом с собой красивую девушку, которая ведет себя с ним, как со своим парнем. Позже Эйджи узнает, что с того вечера прошло 3 дня. Что он делал все это время и почему не помнит ничего об этом? Столкнувшись с реальностью, он попадет в трагедию…  
  
Itou Shouta's Twitter: [@shota\_itooooo](https://twitter.com/shota_itooooo)
description.vi: Urashima Eiji, một sinh viên đại học, đi ngủ sau một đêm uống rượu vui vẻ với bạn bè. Khi tỉnh dậy, anh phát hiện ra một cô gái xinh đẹp bên cạnh, người đối xử với anh như thể họ đang trong một mối quan hệ yêu đương. Sau đó, anh phát hiện ra rằng 4 ngày đã trôi qua kể từ khi anh đi ra ngoài cùng với đám bạn của mình. Anh ấy đã làm gì trong suốt thời gian đó và tại sao anh ấy không có ký ức về nó?. Khi đối mặt với thực tế đó, anh sẽ bị cuốn vào bi kịch...

title.en: I'll Give You the Most Rotten One

description.en: Ten years of relationship go down the drain when Haeru discovers that her loving boyfriend, Se-o, spent the night with another woman. What begins as a series of small misunderstandings snowballs into something much bigger as the college sweethearts wade through love, temptation, and workplace drama. Well, what better way to get back at her cheating boyfriend than to take the most rotten revenge ever?

altTitles.vi: Cho Đến Khi Cái Chết Chia Lìa Đôi Ta

altTitles.es: Hasta que la muerte nos separe

altTitles.fr: Jusqu'à ce que la mort nous sépare

altTitles.ja-ro: Shi ga Futari wo Wakatsu Made

altTitles.th: เนตรปริศนาล่าทรชน

altTitles.ja: 死がふたりを分かつまで

description.en:
The future is a great unknown. Throughout history, those who have been graced with the power to read it have been sought by many. In this day and age, the term "prophet" is outdated. "Precog," as in precognition, is the modern term.  
  
Yet when the powers of precognition is graced upon a young girl named Tohyama Haruka, she is sought after by a powerful organization. Utilizing her powers, Haruka makes contact with Hijikata Mamoru, a blind swordsman. When cornered by her captors, Haruka proposes an outrageous condition to Mamoru. Haruka wants Mamoru to protect her until death do them apart.  
  
[Song Ji-Hyoung is the real name of the artist who uses the pen name Double S]
description.vi: Một cô bé có thể nhìn thấy trước tương lai, 1 món quà từ thượng đế hay là nỗi bất hạnh? Cô bị bọn yakuza truy đuổi nhằm mưu lợi cá nhân và cô muốn thoát khỏi tay bọn chúng. Dựa vào năng lực của mình, cô đã tìm đến một người đàn ông bị mù mắt nhưng cực kỳ mạnh mẽ, người có thể giúp cô trốn thoát…

title.en: I Tried to Live a Good Life

description.en:
After my grandmother's funeral, I woke up in the body of a noblewoman. Specifically, a woman who had died because she didn’t want to get married.

The older brother of the man she was supposed to marry comes to me, threatening to pay off her debts, and my father is absolutely no help at all.
On top of that, the shop is about to disappear, and the estate is falling apart.
Just yesterday, I was a modern person finding small joys like sneaking a coffee from the break room or charging my phone at the office, but now I have to pay off debts and manage an estate.
I tried to live a good life, just as the god had said when he gave me this chance…
"I wonder if selling a few loaves of bread will really help you pay it back."
"Don't worry, I'll pay it off."
"If such a miracle happens."
He turned to me, standing slightly askew with his arms crossed over his chest. Even in his anger, he looked astonishingly handsome.
"If that miracle occurs, I'll kneel before you and kiss the top of your foot."

title.en: My Evil Husband is Obsessed With the Wrong Person

altTitles.en: Dear Villainous Husband, the One to Be Obsessed With Is Over There
The Person Who Is Obsessed With the Villain Husband Is Over There
Villainous Husband, the One You're Obsessed With Is Over There

altTitles.es-la: Marido Villano, con la que estas obsesionado esta en otra parte

altTitles.en: Mr. Villain Husband, the One You Should Be Obsessing With Is Over There

description.en: Getting reincarnated into the world of a novel is never easy, but possessing a doomed bride on her way down the aisle to marry a murderous emperor is just unfair! Now, the newly reincarnated Angelica has no choice but to learn to survive the whims of her new husband, Emperor Ranielo… Well, at least until he falls for his fated love interest and she can slip away unnoticed. But as the days pass, Ranielo’s interest in her only grows. Can this tyrant be tamed, or will Angelica find that some destinies can’t be unwritten?

title.en: Blue Archive & Jujutsu Kaisen - The Story of Suguru Geto Becoming Sensei (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 夏油傑シャーレの先生概念

altTitles.ja-ro: Geto Suguru Share no Sensei Gainen

title.en: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai

altTitles.en: I Wanna Do Bad Things with You

altTitles.ja: 君と悪いことがしたい

description.en: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Soushi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
description.ja: 背は高いけど地味で暗い脇役女子・まもり。嫌いだからとプールの水を抜く、学校一の嫌われ者の悪役男子・藤。悪いヤツの、不思議な強さに惹かれていったその先にあったのは、透き通るような青い日々。

title.en: “Life de Ukete Life de Naguru” Korezo Watashi no Hisshouhou

altTitles.ja: 『ライフで受けてライフで殴る』これぞ私の必勝法@COMIC

altTitles.zh: 『用命来扛，用命反击』这就是我的必胜法则@COMIC

description.ja:
「ライフがあれば、余裕だね！」
VRMMOが一大ゲームジャンルとして確立されている、現代より少し未来の日本。
VRゲーム初心者のユキは親友のカナに誘われ、配信しながらプレイをすることに。
彼女が閃いた遊び方——それはHP極振り×カウンタースキル“GAMAN”の究極脳筋プレイ！？
当然、他ステータスは全て０な上、攻撃するにもまずはノーガードで殴られる必要があるのだ。
周囲からは驚かれ笑われるも、そんなものはどこ吹く風！
どんな敵モンスターも、貯めたダメージそのまま極太ビームでお返し＆殲滅！
ノリと勢いでレア職業“聖女”や大量の称号を次々とゲットしていく。
遂には、ゲーム開始早々うっかり大規模イベントを発生させてしまい……？
駆け引き無視して一撃逆転！
砲台系少女のVRMMOファンタジー、開幕!!
description.zh:
「只要还有生命值，就没什么大不了的！」
距离现代稍微更近未来一些的日本，VRMMO成为一大游戏分类。
VR游戏新手小雪在好友小奏的邀请下，开始了一边玩游戏一边直播的冒险。
她灵光一闪想出的游玩思路是——将HP加到极限×使用反击技能“GAMAN（忍耐）”的究极莽夫流玩法！？
当然，不仅除了HP以外其他属性都是0，而且要攻击的话，也必须先卸防挨打才能反击。
无论周围的人们如何惊讶或嘲笑，她都将之全抛却脑后！
无论遇上什么怪物，她都能将受到的伤害蓄积起来并以超强射线进行反击&歼灭！
凭借一时兴起的种种行动，她接连获得了稀有职业“圣女”和大量称号。
最终，在游戏开服后不久，她就无意中引发了大规模事件……？
无视策略，一击逆转！
炮台系少女的VRMMO奇幻故事，就此开幕！

altTitles.ja: レイン

description.en:
The small country Sunkwoll is in a tight spot because it's under attack of the great country Zarmine. But the general, Rain, who's reputed to be an exceptionally gifted swordsman, is against the war and won't enter the battle. But how is one supposed to wage a war like this anyway?  
  
*Note: Author passed away in Feb 2019, leaving the source material for the manga, novel incomplete.*

altTitles.ja: さいはてのポラリス

description.en: Chise has always believed: "Mom's actions are for my sake, so they're correct"—even when feeling suffocated. One night, she sees the delinquent classmate Asahi ride his bike with his friends, and starts to become intrigued by him…?

In the 1950s, an old woman was brutally murdered on the face of a clock tower by her adopted daughter. Two years later, the clock tower is known as the 'ghost tower' and it is supposedly haunted. Through an unusual series of events, a young NEET man named Amano Taichi is attacked by someone or something in the same clock tower, and finds himself bound to the clock face to be killed in the same way as the old woman. Luckily for Amano, he doesn't meet the same fate. He's rescued by a mysterious person who claims his name is Tetsuo.  
  
Tetsuo is searching for a treasure that is connected with the ghost tower, and he wants Taichi to be his partner. Taichi, whose life has mostly consisted of poverty, loneliness, and pornography, is enticed by the idea of gaining extreme wealth. He's further convinced when a house fire leaves him without a home and depends on Tetsuo's charity. The adventure is going to be very dangerous, since the same 'enemies' who attacked Taichi before seem certain to try something again! Not to mention, Taichi really knows very little about his new partner, especially while regarding his true identity!
description.pt-br:
Em 1950, uma idosa foi brutalmente morta na face de uma Torre do Relógio por sua filha adotiva. Dois anos depois, a Torre do Relógio ficou conhecida como a "Torre Fantasma" e está supostamente assombrada. Através dessas séries de eventos incomuns, um jovem NEET chamado Amano Taichi é atacado por alguém ou algo na mesma Torre do Relógio, e encontra-se preso na face do relógio, pronto pra ser morto da mesma maneira que a idosa foi. Pra sorte de Amano, ele não encontra o mesmo destino. Ele é resgatado por uma pessoa misteriosa que alega se chamar Tetsuo.

Tetsuo está procurando por um tesouro que está  conectado com a Torre Fantasma, e ele quer que Taichi seja seu parceiro. Taichi fica mais convencido sobre a proposta quando sua casa pega fogo e fica sem onde morar, sendo obrigado a depender da caridade de Tetsuo. A aventura vai ser extremamente perigosa, já que os mesmos 'inimigos' quem atacaram Taichi antes parecem que vão tentar algo novamente! Sem mencionar que, Taichi realmente sabe muito pouco sobre seu parceiro, incluindo "seu" verdadeiro sexo!

altTitles.fr: Darren Shan - Le cirque de l'étrange

altTitles.ja: ダレン・シャン

altTitles.en: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant

description.en:
Darren Shan's an ordinary schoolboy, until he and his best friend Steve get tickets to the Cirque Du Freak, a bizarre freak show featuring such arcane performers. In the midst of the ghoulish excitement, true terror raises its head when Steve recognises that one of the performers – Mr Crepsley – is in fact a vampire! That's when the hands of fate changes the lives of them forever!  
  
Based on the english novel series Cirque Du Freak by author Darren Shan.

altTitles.ja: クロザクロ

description.en: Sakurai Mikito is a wimp who is constantly bullied and never fights back, as he doesn't want to hurt others.This all changes when a mysterious sphere enters him - Zakuro. He soon begins to feel different feeling desires to eat… humans. Is he still human, or will he succumb to his desires and fully become a monster?
description.ja:
「他人を傷つけるくらいなら、傷つけられたほうがいい……」

心優しきいじめられっ子、高校生・桜井幹人。彼の体に、ある日突然謎の「種」が入ってしまった。そして幹人は、夢の中で不思議な子供・ザクロに出会う――。夢の中で「強くなりたい」と望んだ幹人だったが、直後から怒りっぽくなり、人が食糧に見えるようになってしまう。――なんと彼は、人を喰う「傀牙（オーガ）」になろうとしていたのだ！！

altTitles.ja: シェアード・ドリーム～共有されし夢～

description.en:
What if there exists another world beyond lucid dreaming? That is where those who have been stolen of their dreams gather. Do Shi-Eon, who escapes reality by lucid dreaming, loses his dream and falls into the space of 'Shared Dream.' Now he must fight to reclaim his dream.

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/bestdream/list?title_no=3123)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/gongxiangmengjing/list?title_no=1680)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001102)
description.ja:
現実には興味がない。なぜなら俺にとっての「現実」とはあの世界だけだから…。 ここは、夢だということを自覚して見る夢。自分の思い通りの世界を創り出せる、自分だけの場所…だったはずが、この世界にいるのは俺だけじゃなかった！？

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/bestdream/list?title_no=3123)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/gongxiangmengjing/list?title_no=1680)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001102)
description.ko:
자각몽을 뛰어넘은 또 다른 꿈의 세계가 있다면?
꿈을 빼앗긴 자들이 모이는 곳

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/bestdream/list?title_no=3123)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/gongxiangmengjing/list?title_no=1680)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001102)
description.ru:
Что если, за пределами осознанных снов,существует другой мир сновидений? Место, где люди, у которых отобрали их сны, сообираются вместе. Для чего же? Читайте и узнаете!

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/bestdream/list?title_no=3123)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/gongxiangmengjing/list?title_no=1680)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001102)
description.zh:
本以为是梦境的主宰，
却被迫卷进夺命梦境！
“共享梦境”里聚集了所有梦被抢走的人，男主为了夺回自己的梦境，在这里开始了属于梦境的战斗！从弱鸡到王者，只是一个“共享梦境”的距离吗？

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/bestdream/list?title_no=3123)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/gongxiangmengjing/list?title_no=1680)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001102)
description.zh-hk:
超越清醒夢以外的世界－共有夢：夢境被奪走的人聚集之處。

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/bestdream/list?title_no=3123)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/gongxiangmengjing/list?title_no=1680)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001102)

altTitles.ja: 邪神ちゃんドロップキック

description.en:
Jashin-chan Dropkick is a violent slapstic comedy about a delusional gothic lolita, Yurine, who summons a demon girl with the tail of a cobra, Jashin-chan.
They'll have to live together until Yurine finds a way to send Jashin-chan back to hell, or until Jashin-chan kills Yurine.

---

[Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20484)
description.ja:
魔界の悪魔、通称「邪神ちゃん」は、ある日突然、人間界に召喚されてしまう。
彼女を召喚したのは、神保町のボロアパートで暮らす、ちょっとブラックな心を持つ女子大生、花園ゆりねだった。しかもゆりねは、邪神ちゃんを魔界に帰す方法がわからないと言う。仕方なく一緒に暮らし始めた邪神ちゃんとゆりね。しかし、召喚者が死ねば魔界に帰れることから邪神ちゃんはゆりねを……!?
少女と邪神ちゃんが繰り広げるちょっとキケンな同居生活コメディ！
description.pt-br:
Jashin-chan Dropkick é uma comédia violenta sobre uma lolita gótica, Yurine, que invoca uma garota demônio com um rabo de cobra, Jashin-chan.
Elas terão que viver juntas até que Yurine encontre uma maneira de enviar Jashin-chan de volta ao inferno, ou até que Jashin-chan mate Yurine.

description.en: Lin Ling is unfortunate in everything she does… Until the day she met Fang Wan, a kind and perfect upperclassman. She unconsciously grew attracted to her. Somewhere in the vast universe, there is always someone who is closely connected with you, and if fate allows it, you will never be alone.

altTitles.th: ฮานะมารุ อนุบาลเด็กดีนะจะบอกให้

altTitles.ja: はなまる幼稚園

description.en: Anzu goes to a preschool with her friends, the shy Koume and the eccentric Hiiragi. Together, they try to gain Anzu attention from their male caretaker Tsuchida, though he is clearly more interested in the pretty Yamamoto who supervises the class next door.
description.pt-br:
Anzu é uma criança do jardim de infância com uma grande paixão por seu professor Tsuchida, mas Tsuchida claramente prefere Yamamoto, uma jovem professora que lida com a classe ao lado, e Anzu tem suas duas amigas para ajudá-la: a tímida Koume e a excêntrica Hiiragi.

NOTA: Hanamaru é o equivalente à estrela de ouro concedida para as crianças por um bom trabalho na escolas.

altTitles.ja: 負けヒロインが多すぎる！@comic
マケイン

altTitles.th: รักครั้งนี้มีคนนกเยอะไปมั้ย?!

altTitles.vi: Có Quá Nhiều Nữ Chính Thua Cuộc! @comic

description.en:
***“Huh? Who are you calling losing?”***

As the background of the class, I, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, witnessed a popular girl–Anna Yanami, getting rejected by another guy.

_“Even though he said we’ll get married. Don’t you think he’s pretty mean?”
“When did he say that?”
“When we were 4 or 5 years old.”_

That doesn’t count, right? With this, the losing heroines like Remon Yakishio from the Track and Field Club, and Chika Komari, from the literature club.

_“Nukumizu-kun. There are two types of girls. Childhood friends or cheating cats.”
“I see. Well, that’s a bold statement.”_

There’s a fortune for those who shine only after losing. Losing Heroines—The curtain to the mysterious coming-of-age story “Makeine” opens now!
___
**Character Designer:** [Imigimuru](https://mangadex.org/author/341a08ca-acbf-49a3-998a-d3451249ec43)

**Additional Links:**  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/books/09453017)
- [Alternative Raw](https://shogakukan-comic.jp/book-series?cd=51545)
description.ja:
クラスの背景モブ高校生こと温水和彦は、男子に人気のクラスメート・八奈見杏菜が幼馴染にフラれるのを目撃してしまう。
仕方なく八奈見を慰める温水だが、それをきっかけに、様々な負け感あふれる女子たちに絡まれることになり――!?
負けヒロイン――マケインたちと辿る謎の青春が、ここに幕を開ける！
負けてこそ輝く彼女たちに、幸いあれ。
description.vi:
“Hử? Cậu gọi ai là đồ thua cuộc cơ?”

Tôi, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, một nhân vật làm nền trong lớp, chứng kiến cảnh cô nàng nổi tiếng – Anna Yanami bị một nam sinh khác từ chối.

“Dù cho cậu ấy đã từng nói bọn mình sẽ kết hôn đấy. Cậu có thấy cậu ấy quá đáng không?”

“Cậu ấy nói thế vào lúc nào vậy?”

“Hồi bọn tớ 4 hay 5 tuổi gì đó.”

Thế thì đâu có tính?

Cùng với cô nàng còn có những nữ chính thua cuộc khác như Remon Yakishio của Câu lạc bộ Điền kinh và Komari Chika từ Câu lạc bộ Văn học.

“Nukumizu-kun nè, trên đời có hai loại con gái. Một là bạn thuở nhỏ, còn lại là đồ đàn bà giựt bồ.”

“Vậy hả. Chà, một tuyên bố đầy táo bạo ha.”

Có một loại vận mệnh rằng có những người chỉ thực sự toả sáng sau khi đã thua cuộc.

Những nữ chính thua cuộc—Bức màn câu chuyện tuổi mới lớn mang tên “Makein” sẽ lật mở ngay bây giờ!
description.es-la: "¿Eh? ¿A quién llamas perdedor?" Como fondo de la clase, yo, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, fui testigo de cómo una chica popular -Anna Yanami- era rechazada por otro chico. "Aunque dijo que nos casaríamos. ¿No crees que es bastante malo?" "¿Cuándo dijo eso?" "Cuando teníamos 4 o 5 años". Eso no cuenta, ¿verdad? Con esto, las heroínas perdedoras como Remon Yakishio del Club de Atletismo, y Chika Komari, del club de literatura. "Nukumizu-kun. Hay dos tipos de chicas. Las amigas de la infancia o las gatas tramposas". "Ya veo. Bueno, esa es una declaración audaz". Hay una fortuna para los que brillan sólo después de perder. ¡Heroínas perdedoras-El telón de la misteriosa historia de madurez "Makeine" se abre ahora! ["Makeine" es la abreviación del nombre del manga]
description.pt-br: O simples, chato e sem amigos Nukumizu Kazuhiko testemunhou algo completamente desconcertante: a garota popular Yanami Anna foi colocada na friend zone por seu crush e amigo de infância! Na verdade, todas as garotas populares ao redor dele estão sendo rejeitadas da mesma forma pelos garotos de quem gostam. Sem perceber, Kazuhiko se envolve no drama do relacionamento onde todas as heroínas principais estão perdendo o amor! Ele pode manter o ânimo delas e ajudá-las a encontrar a felicidade?

title.en: Eiyuu ni Akogareta Shoujo wa Kyuuketsuki ni Ochitemo Eiyuu o Mezasu

altTitles.ja: 『英雄』に憧れた少女は吸血鬼に堕ちても『英雄』を目指す

altTitles.ja-ro: "Eiyuu" ni Akogareta Shoujo wa Kyuuketsuki ni Ochitemo "Eiyuu" wo Mezasu

altTitles.en: A Girl Who Longed to Be a "Hero" Aims to Be a "Hero" Even If She Falls Into Becoming a Vampire

altTitles.ru: Девушка, которая мечтала стать "героем", стремится к этому, даже если превратится в вампира

description.en: “We'll kill all vampires. Sharing our own fallen 『 blood 』 as a weapon...!!” ―― Arbitration Knights travel around the world to protect peace. Rinslet, a girl who has just become a regular knight, meets Yuri, a vampire girl with cool silver hair and crimson eyes. Rinslet learns that she is an abomination who kills her own kind by manipulating the power of 《 blood armor 》, which materializes blood into swords, bows and arrows. She becomes Yuri's kin in exchange for her life, and her goal is...?Yuri x Vampire x Dark Fantasy!
description.ja: 「私達は全ての吸血鬼を殺す。自らの堕ちた『血』を分け与え武器として…!!」――世界各国を巡り平和を守る調停騎士団。その正騎士になったばかりの少女・リンスレットが出会ったのは、涼やかな銀髪と深紅の瞳を持つ吸血鬼の少女・ユーリ。血液を剣や弓矢に具現化する《血装》の力を操って同族を殺す彼女に対し、忌むべき存在と知りながら想いを通じ合わせるリンスレット。命と引き換えにユーリの眷族となった彼女が目指すは…!?百合×吸血鬼×ダークファンタジ！！

title.en: A Divorced Evil Lady Bakes Cakes

description.en: I had been working hard as the Duchess for nine years, supporting my quiet and indifferent husband, but all I was left with was contempt, indifference, and accusal of having a love affair. So when he finally asked for a divorce to marry his long-time lover... “There’s a limit to what I can endure for this marriage. No matter how much you cry or plead to the Emperor, I can’t stand it anymore.” “Can I sign here?” “So if you pretend to be poor like last time, this time… what? I waved divorce papers on an indifferent day. “I’m done. Can I go now?” “Oh, since we both had lovers, of course, I won’t be receiving alimony, but you’ll surely return my dowry, right?” “What are you gonna do with that little money?”, asked my husband, who had not cared what he had done for the past nine years. I laughed confidently and answered: “I’m going to open a dessert cafe.”

altTitles.ja: 恋する暴君

description.en: University student Tetsuhiro Morinaga has been in love with his homophobic, violent and tyrannical senpai Souichi Tatsumi for more than four years now. Even though in the previous series, Challengers, he told Souichi how he feels and even managed to get a kiss, he never expected anything more… That is until the long-oppressed Morinaga gets his biggest chance ever. Will his unrequited love finally be returned?

title.en: Kimi to Ikirareru Nara Shindemo Ii

altTitles.ja: 君と生きられるなら死んでもいい

description.en:
"I can't remember someone important who was always beside me."

Houri, who lives a very ordinary life, is drawn to a crosswalk and almost gets run over by a truck, but is saved by a man who passes by.
The moment he sees the man's face, he has flashbacks of him past life, when the two of them were intimate.
The two are led by a super-powerful fate to make love, but the next morning, the man declares that he doesn't remember Houri...!?
A story of love that returns until death do them part.

altTitles.ja-ro: Eris no Seihai: Konyaku Haki Sareta Reijou wa, Kidai no Akujo ni Tasukerareta Daisho Toshite Fukushuu ni Tsuki Awasaremasu

altTitles.ja: エリスの聖杯 ～婚約破棄された令嬢は、稀代の悪女に助けられた代償として復讐に付き合わされます～

description.en:
Constance, the daughter to a Viscount whose only value is her honesty, and Scarlet Castiel, the most reviled villainess of the era who was sentenced to death ten years ago. When the two people who were never supposed to meet encountered one another at a night party, the story that should have ended with Scarlet's death began anew.  
  
Although their relationship only began out of mutual interest, they soon became true partners in an effort to unravel the mysteries of a grand conspiracy borne out of the past, that still has a vicious grip on the present.

altTitles.ja: MAIDes─メイデス─メイド、地獄の戦場に転送される。固有のゴミ収集魔法で、最弱クラスのまま人類最強に。@COMIC

altTitles.en: Maid, transported to the hellish battlefield, with only her unique garbage collection magic,  stays the weakest class yet becomes humanity's strongest.

description.en:
"……W-what should I do? I’m being transported to the battlefield of hell!"

In the midst of the war against the demonic beasts, where humanity faces the threat of extinction, the maid girl Orsela accidentally finds herself transferred to a forest on the front lines of the battlefield. She has no weapons or combat experience; all she possesses is her seemingly useless inherent magic, which can only summon things that people no longer need.

When she encounters a large magical beast—a dragon—and finds herself in a desperate, life-threatening situation, she gambles everything and summons a magical weapon: a revolver, and a battle-crazed girl of heroic class!?

The magic that was thought to be useless turns out to be more suited for battle than any other magic...

Before she knows it, she becomes the last bastion protecting humanity!

The weakest class maid carves out a future for mankind!
A survival fantasy of rising to the top in a world on the brink of collapse begins!

altTitles.ja: 神様が見てないから

description.en:
Sakuya, who was raised in a church, was supposed to be living a modest but warm life alongside Sister Lamia, or that's how it should have been…! Though she tries to appear seductive, she's actually pure. Though she can be slightly dimwitted, she's adorable. Even though he tries to resist, Sakuya is continuously being led around her. The forbidden love comedy between a straitlaced boy and the nun who wants to get closer to him!
___
**Individual Chapter Retail Pages:**
- [BOOK☆WALKER](https://bookwalker.jp/series/477085/)
- [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0DBBXDCGD)
- [ebookjapan](https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/836755/)
description.ja: 教会で育てられた少年・咲夜はシスター・ラミアと慎ましくも温かい暮らしをしていた――。はずだった…！エッチなふりして実はピュア、ちょっぴりアホだけど可愛いシスターに振り回されっぱなし！『いや、僕らそんなことしてる場合じゃないんだって!!!』そう…彼らには恋仲になれない理由がある。ある日　世界は崩壊してしまったから―――。

altTitles.ja: ザ・シェフ

description.en: Ajizawa is a renowned master chef, but he doesn’t have a restaurant. He is a “fixer”, a man who travels from place to place fixing menus and restaurants much like Gordon Ramsey, and he charges a fortune to do it. If your menu must be perfect to impress a foreign client, a head of state, or just a neighbor, Ajizawa is the man to do it. But why does he do it? Is it only the money, or is his mission much deeper…

altTitles.ja: 他校のボーイッシュ彼女

title.en: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! - A Day of KazuMegu (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: この素晴らしい世界に祝福を! -「100日後に結婚するカズめぐ」

altTitles.en: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! - KazuMegu Will Get Married In 100 days
Kazuma & Megumin Will Get Married in 100 Days

description.en: A parody of ["This Croc Will Die In 100 Days"](https://mangadex.org/title/44625/this-croc-will-die-in-100-days)

altTitles.ja: からかい上手(?)の西片さん

altTitles.tl: Ang magaling sa pang-aasar (?) na si Nishikata

description.en: In this spinoff of "Teasing Master Takagi-san", and continuation of "Teasing Master (former) Takagi-san", Chi Nishikata tries her hardest to tease her classmate Ooshiro, but for some reason it feels like she's met him somewhere. Can she finally get one over on him and remember her past?
description.fr: Dans ce spin-off de « Quand Takagi me taquine “, et suite de ” Quand Takagi me taquinait », Chi Nishikata fait de son mieux pour taquiner son camarade de classe Ooshiro, mais elle a l'impression de l'avoir déjà rencontré quelque part. Parviendra-t-elle enfin à prendre le dessus sur lui et à se souvenir du passé ?
description.tl: Nagsisimula na ang kwento ng pang-aasar ni Chi Nishikata? Ang kwentong ito ay nakatuon kay Chi, ang anak nina Nishikata at (dating) Takagi. Tulad ng dati, siya ay masigasig sa pang-aasar sa kanyang katabi sa upuan, si Ooshiro...!
description.uk: Це спін-офф манг "Майстер дражнилок Такаґі-сан" та "Майстер дражнилок(колишня) Такаґі-сан". Донька головних героїв Чі іде до школи і зустрічає друга дитинства. Як складуться їх відносини і чи зможе вона подражнити хлопця?
description.pt-br: Neste spin-off de "Karakai Jouzu no Takagi-san" e continuação de "Karakai Jouzu no (Moto) Takagi-san", Nishikata Chi se esforça ao máximo para provocar seu colega de classe Ooshiro, mas por algum motivo parece que ela o conhece de algum lugar. Ela pode finalmente superá-lo e lembrar de seu passado?

altTitles.ja: サンダ

description.en:
In the year 2080, the world is like it is now, yet different. Government-arranged marriages, elaborate plastic surgery, and medical science are at the forefront of Japanese society.

Sanda Kazushige is a middle-school student who hasn't quite matured, despite being in the thralls of puberty. Put into a life-threatening situation by his classmate Fuyumura, Sanda discovers his uncanny ability to turn into a burly (and more grown) Santa Claus, and is thrown into a world of chaos to save his fellow students in only ways Santa Claus can do, while trying to solve the mysteries of the school he attends and the truth to where his supposedly-dead classmate Ono went.
description.ja: これは少し未来のお話。超少子化が進み、様々な風習が失われた近未来。大黒愛護学園に通う普通の少年、三田は、なぜか同級生の冬村四織に命を狙われていた。突如として振り下ろされる凶刃。それには、行方不明になった冬村の友人と、三田が抱えている「とある呪い」に理由があって…!?

altTitles.ja: あまあま

description.en: Yuji's girlfriend Misaki may seem hard and cold on the outside, but inside she's actually soft and loving. As they prepare for their high school entrance exams, Misaki decides that they should temporarily cut off all their dating activities. Will they be able to study hard enough through this period to get into the same high school?

altTitles.ja: アウトサイダー パラダイス

description.en: From the author of Asobi Asobase comes a new comedy series, about… the Art Club from Asobi Asobase.

altTitles.ja: 恋愛の授業

description.en:
In 20XX, the Love Education Law was enacted. "Love" has become a mandatory subject in a response to the declining birthrate. 

Michitaka Sato, a high school student who has given up on romance and works hard on his studies, is on the verge of failing school. When he attends a supplementary class to avoid repeating a grade, Mai Aihara, a beautiful girl who is a problem child, appears as his partner...? Suddenly, he begins to study love alone with the beautiful girl in the three C's. Close contact, close quarters, and behind closed doors! Does Aihara-san have a secret...?
description.ja:
20××年、恋愛教育法成立。少子化対策として「恋愛」が必修科目となった。

女子にトラウマのある高校生・秦野満月は、奥手ゆえに落第寸前に陥る。憧れのヒロイン・七瀬愛に近づくこともできないのか、そう思った矢先、同じく恋愛落第生の幼なじみ・可愛川茜と恋愛の補習を受けることに…!? 

恋を学んで幸せになれ! 恋愛学習型ラブコメ、開幕!
description.vi: Vào năm 20XX, Luật Giáo dục Tình yêu đã được ban hành. \"Tình yêu\" đã trở thành một chủ đề bắt buộc để đối phó với tỷ lệ sinh giảm.Tahano Mitsuki, một học sinh trung học đã từ bỏ sự lãng mạn và chăm chỉ học tập, đang trên bờ vực thất bại ở trường. Khi anh ấy tham gia một lớp học bổ sung để tránh học lại lớp, Mai Aihara, một cô gái xinh đẹp là một đứa trẻ có vấn đề, xuất hiện như là đối tác của anh ấy...? Đột nhiên, anh bắt đầu nghiên cứu tình yêu một mình với cô gái xinh đẹp trong ba C. Tiếp xúc gần, khu vực gần gũi và sau cánh cửa đóng kín! Aihara-san có bí mật gì không...? Một bộ phim hài lãng mạn học hỏi tình yêu giữa một cô gái JK xinh đẹp và một chàng trai.

altTitles.en: Let's Have a Toast With Miso Soup!

altTitles.ja: 味噌汁でカンパイ！

description.en:
Zenichirou is a middle school student raised in a motherless family. His breakfast always consists of onigiri and instant miso soup from the convenience store. Yae, a childhood friend of Zenichirou, cannot stand to see him eat such an innutritious breakfast, so she decides to make him breakfast every morning…  
  
This story conveys a simple message: eating with another person makes miso soup taste more delicious and hearty!

'Can you buff me?'

Monaka, who looks like a top-tier experienced player at a glance, offers to form a party with White Jack, who's a returning player of “Lunatic Online”, but…

'Don't step on that.'

'Ack!' 

'Take a potion.' 

'Hack! Haack!' 

'I'm sorry… I couldn't click on the potion.'

Get to know the noob, White Jack, Monaka's character, and the other guild members.

'We're getting married, so change genders, Hyung. You lost earlier at rock-paper-scissors.'

The chaotic life of Lunatic's Netkama*!

(This game is set in the virtual game “Lunatic”, which is based on the online game “La Tale”.)

(Please be aware: Due to the nature of this series, this work purposely uses incorrect spellings for a sense of realism.)

*TL/N: Scarecrow can also mean 'puppet/figurehead'.
*Netkama is a term for when a male uses a female character online and hides their true identity. The original author, Kimma, also wrote the novel, “Netkama Punch!!!”.

altTitles.ja: 最強の王様、二度目の人生は何をする？

altTitles.es-la: La Vida Después de la Muerte

description.de:
In einer Welt regiert durch die stärksten Kämpfer ist König Grey der unangefochten Stärkste, Reichste und Berühmteste. Aber eine solche Macht kommt Hand in Hand mit Einsamkeit. Unter der glamourösen Erscheinung eines mächtigen Königs liegt die leere Hülle eines Mannes, beraubt von Ziel und Willen.

Nach einer Wiedergeburt in eine Welt voller Magie und Monster hat der König die Möglichkeit, sein Leben erneut zu leben. Die Fehler seiner Vergangenheit zu korrigieren wird aber nicht seine einzige Herausforderung sein. Unter dem Frieden und Reichtum dieser neuen Welt lauert etwas, das alles vernichten kann, was er jemals erreicht hat, was seine Rolle darin und den Grund für seine Wiedergeburt in Frage stellt.
description.en:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.
description.fr:
Le Roi Grey a une force, une richesse et un prestige inégalés dans un monde gouverné par l'aptitude martiale. Cependant, la solitude s'approche de près derrière ceux ayant de grands pouvoirs. Sous l'apparence glamour d'un Roi puissant se cache la carapace de l'homme, dépourvue de volonté et de but.

Réincarné dans un nouveau monde rempli de monstres et de magie, le Roi a une seconde chance de revivre sa vie. Cependant, corriger les erreurs de sa précédente vie ne sera pas sa seule tâche. Sous la paix et la prospérité de ce nouveau monde se cache une menace sous-jacente remettant en question tout ce pour quoi il a travaillé, son rôle, et sa raison de renaître.
description.ja: 私は史上最強の「王」である。数多の敵を退け、数々の功績を残した歴代最高の覇王だ。 しかし、ある朝目覚めた私は奇妙な違和感を覚える。手足が短い、視界が極端に低い、見知らぬ男女が私を「アーサー」と呼び、微笑みながら覗き込む。そう…私は無力な赤子に転生してしまったのだ！最強の王様がいたいけな赤ちゃんに転生する、痛快冒険ファンタジー‼
description.pl:
Król Gray ma niezrównaną siłę, bogactwo i prestiż w świecie rządzonym przez umiejętności walki. Jednak samotność pozostaje tuż za tymi, którzy mają wielką moc. Pod olśniewającą powierzchownością potężnego króla kryje się skorupa człowieka, pozbawionego celu i woli.

Wskrzeszony w nowym świecie wypełnionym magią i potworami, król ma drugą szansę na ponowne przeżycie swojego życia. Jednak naprawienie błędów przeszłości nie będzie jego jedynym wyzwaniem. Pod pokojem i dobrobytem nowego świata kryje się ukryty nurt, który grozi zniszczeniem wszystkiego, na co pracował, kwestionując jego rolę i powód narodzin na nowo.
description.ru: Король Грей обладает непревзойденной силой, богатством и престижем в мире, во главе которого стоит боевая мощь. Однако одиночество обычно появляется именно у тех, кто обладает большой властью. Мало кто знает, но под гламурной внешностью могущественного короля скрывается оболочка человека, лишённого цели и воли.
description.pt-br:
Dizem que a solidão acompanha aqueles com grande poder. Permanecendo como um Rei com força incomparável, status, e fama… e muito mais. Eu, que uma vez lutei para viver, me afogava em meu raso trono sem nenhuma vontade ou propósito. Haviam muitos que tinham inveja de mim, mas eu diria de bom grado, “Tirem tudo de mim! Será meu presente!” Um dia, eu finalmente consegui meu presente – uma nova vida.

Com uma segunda chance de corrigir meus erros e cumprir meus arrependimentos, permita-me mostrar a você o que um (ex-rei) pode fazer!

title.en: WataMote: No Matter How I Look at It, It's You Guys' Fault I'm Not Popular!

altTitles.en: It's Not My Fault That I'm Not Popular

altTitles.ja: わたモテ
私がモテないのはどう考えてもお前らが悪い!

altTitles.ko: 내가 인기 없는 건 아무리 생각해도 너희들 탓이야!

altTitles.th: สาวมืดมนอลวนหารัก

altTitles.es-la: No importa como lo vea, ¡Es culpa suya que yo no sea popular!

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui!

altTitles.pt-br: Não É Minha Culpa Não Ser Popular!

description.en:
Tomoko Kuroki naturally assumed she'd be popular when she got to high school... but then cold, hard reality swooped in for the attack! Turns out all the popularity points she's racked up in her video game dating sims are worth squat in real life, and Tomoko's far from prepared to navigate high school! 

How can she possibly hope to impress her classmates when she can't even talk to them?! A new high-school heroine is born (maybe?)!
description.pl: Główna bohaterka serii – Kuroki Tomoko – jest ultra-popularną uczennicą liceum, która umówiła się już z ponad setką chłopaków… W grach Otome. W realnym świecie jest socjopatką, która zupełnie nie radzi sobie z komunikacją z innymi ludźmi, a w szczególności z płcią przeciwną. Manga opowiada o jej kuriozalnych próbach (z reguły niezbyt udanych) usocjalnienia się i zmienienia się w osobę bardziej popularną.
description.es-la: Kuroki Tomoko, una chica que tiene "50 años de experiencia" en citas y que ha salido con más de un centenar de chicos… en juegos otome. En la vida real acaba de cumplir 15 años y va a dar comienzo su época en el instituto, está convencida de que con sus conocimientos será la más de popular. Una vez comienza el instituto, comienzan a pasar los días y se da cuenta de que no habla con nadie. ¿Cómo es posible? Un simple vistazo al espejo le hace darse cuenta de la realidad: no es precisamente una belleza y parece que hasta puede ser antipática. Poco a poco intentará cambiar para ser popular, pero claro, entre lo que le cuesta y lo que tiene una idea bastante distorsionada de la realidad, no será tan sencillo.
description.pt-br:
Tomoko Kuroki naturalmente presumiu que ela seria popular quando chegasse ao ensino médio... mas então a realidade fria e dura se abateu para o ataque! Acontece que todos os pontos de popularidade que ela acumulou em seus simuladores de namoro de videogame valem a pena na vida real, e Tomoko está longe de estar preparada para passar pelo ensino médio!

Como ela pode esperar impressionar seus colegas quando ela nem consegue falar com eles?! Nasce uma nova heroína do ensino médio (talvez?)!

description.en: What happens when a girl from a quaint and small town meets the son of a Yakuza crime lord? Will she be able to change him for the better or will he continue down the dangerous and violent path?

Do good or go to hell. The conditions of his new curse seem simple enough for once-hopeful hoodlum Jeonji Kim. Or so it seems when his perky guardian angel shows up on his doorstep one day and heals his limp. But will simply going through the motions of helping people be enough to appease a petty god with a grudge?
description.pl: Bądź dobry lub idź do piekła. Warunki jego nowej klątwy wydają się wystarczająco proste dla niegdyś pełnego nadziei chuligana Jeonjiego Kima. A przynajmniej tak się wydaje, gdy pewnego dnia jego żwawy anioł stróż pojawia się na jego progu i leczy jego utykanie. Czy zwykłe pomaganie ludziom wystarczy, aby udobruchać małostkowego boga miejącego urazę?
description.ru:
Ты был легендой — стал никем,
Как старый лев среди шакалов.
Мечты все обратились в тлен,
Погребены среди завалов.

Увидев слабого, толкни,
Пусть и его жизнь станет адом.
Вот только даже в наши дни
Легенды оживают рядом. © RSC
description.pt-br: Faça o bem ou vá para o inferno. As condições de sua nova maldição parecem simples o suficiente para o outrora esperançoso bandido Kim Jeonji. Ou assim parece quando seu animado anjo da guarda aparece em sua porta um dia e o cura. Mas será que simplesmente fazer o que é necessário para ajudar as pessoas será o suficiente para apaziguar um deus mesquinho com rancor?

description.en: Let the standard adventure story of extremely normal(?) people begin!
